item.title: CVE-2022-23980|2024-08-03T03:59:23.272Z -- dario%20curvino -- yasr%20%E2%80%93%20yet%20another%20stars%20rating%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability discovered in Yasr – Yet Another Stars Rating WordPress plugin (versions <= 2.9.9), vulnerable at parameter 'source'.
